siteCatalyst15.description: SiteCatalyst15 Kaltura analytics implementation. SiteCatalyst15 supports a dynamic set of attributes based on events you want to track and data you want to associate with each event.

sCodePath.doc: The URL to the Ominture generated sCode file. If null, a local copy of s_code.js is used. Must be set in uiConf not via flashvar.

trackEventMonitor.doc: A global callback function for logging Omniture events.

visitorNamespace.doc: The visitor namespace. For example, "corp1", per Ominture documentation.

segmentByMilestones.doc: If events should be segmented by milestones

contentType.doc: The media content type eVar mapping.

mediaSegmentView.doc: The media segment view event mapping.

trackMilestones.doc: The milestone targets to be tracked.

playerLoadedEventEvar1.doc: Player loaded associated event data name.

playerLoadedEventEvar1Value.doc: The evaluated value of the associated event mapping.

openFullscreenEvar1.doc: The associated event name for openFullscreen event.

openFullscreenEvar1Value.doc: The associated event data for openFullscreen event.

shareEventEvar1.doc: An associated event name for shareEvent.

shareEventEvar1Value.doc: The associated event data for shareEvent event.

shareEventProp1.doc: A named property to send with the share event.

shareEventprop1Value.doc: A property value to send with the share event.

shareEventProp2.doc: A named property to send with the share event.

shareEventprop2Value.doc: A property value to send with the share event.
